import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { Content, HeadWrap, SubHeadWrap, TrainingPage } from "./Styles"; import { Helmet } from "react-helmet"; function ShortTraining(props) { useEffect(() => { window.scrollTo(0, 0); }, []); return ( <> Alternative Dispute Resolution Corporate Training Program - JustAct Corporate Short Programme
{/* Welcome to The World of Mediation */} This document is meant to provide with the course objectives and the learning objectives of this training program. Course Objectives

Litigation is a costly and energy consuming process. Not to mention the copious amount of management time used up in it. Alternative Dispute Resolution is a non-adversarial form of dispute resolution that addresses these issues and has proven to deliver substantially better outcomes for all involved. This training program aims to provide corporate managers (legal and otherwise) an exposure to the emerging world of mediation so that they may analyse its efficacy and applicability in their corporate disputes.

Learning Objectives
  1. Introduction to ADR.
  2. What is mediation, its objective and its benefits?
  3. Mediation vs Litigation - comparative analysis.
  4. Nature of disputes & personalities in a dispute.
  5. Structured Process of Mediation.
  6. Principles of Negotiation.
  7. Mediation settlement agreement.
  8. JustAct - Introduction to the platform.
 Duration
  • 10 hours of video lectures.
  • 8 hours of classroom session with one role play.
  • Self learning assignments.
 Contact

For scheduling a program and pricing enquiries, please contact:

  • Madhav Pudipeddi
  • +91-99494 13249
  • madhav.pudipeddi@justact.co.in
{/* Brochure Click here to Open */} ); } export default ShortTraining;
